<root xmlns="k">
<a:b xmlns:a="a:b">
			x &lt; &gt; &amp; ' " 
		   
			x &lt; &gt; &amp; ' " 
			   Y ` a b
			
 

			y

		   
			text
		   <!-- 
			&abc; <  > 
			 cdata node should not be ignored -->
<?PI-NODE  
			&abc; <  > 
			 cdata node should not be ignored ?>
<!-- &abc; <  > -->
</a:b>
<b xmlns="a">
			&amp;abc; &lt;  &gt; 
			 cdata node should not be ignored <INSIDE xmlns="b" />
<abc xmlns="b">xxxxxx</abc>  cdcdcdcdcdcdcd  </b>
</root>
